HELP_MSG:
_Poop Cleaner Bot_ is a bot that helps you manage spam on a telegram group, thanks to the support of group members. When a message gets a predetermined number of reactions of type "ğŸ’©" the bot deletes the message from the group. 

Commands:
/start - Start the bot.
